sentences.sContent: Allison’s vocal style is influenced by country and blues music.

sentences.sContent: ...They are easily-available on the Continent and they are useful if a singer has problems with his vocal chords and has to sing that night...

remMethod.val: voc(声音) ＋ al(…的) → 嗓音的
